analysis.description:
EOSBetBankroll.payEtherToWinner (/unique_chucks/31/0x0af02d90d359a4628ace226df184c3e8b4b816ff.sol#172-195) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! winner.send(amtEther) (/unique_chucks/31/0x0af02d90d359a4628ace226df184c3e8b4b816ff.sol#191-193)
	- ! OWNER.send(amtEther) (/unique_chucks/31/0x0af02d90d359a4628ace226df184c3e8b4b816ff.sol#192)

EOSBetBankroll.payOraclize (/unique_chucks/31/0x0af02d90d359a4628ace226df184c3e8b4b816ff.sol#197-205) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- EOSBetGameInterface(msg.sender).receivePaymentForOraclize.value(amountToPay)() (/unique_chucks/31/0x0af02d90d359a4628ace226df184c3e8b4b816ff.sol#202-205)
contributionTakesBankrollOverLimit in EOSBetBankroll.fallback (/unique_chucks/31/0x0af02d90d359a4628ace226df184c3e8b4b816ff.sol#227) is a local variable never initialiazed
ifContributionTakesBankrollOverLimit_Refund in EOSBetBankroll.fallback (/unique_chucks/31/0x0af02d90d359a4628ace226df184c3e8b4b816ff.sol#227-228) is a local variable never initialiazed

Reentrancy in EOSBetBankroll.withdrawDevelopersFund (/unique_chucks/31/0x0af02d90d359a4628ace226df184c3e8b4b816ff.sol#370-394):
	External calls:
	- EOSBetGameInterface(DICE).payDevelopersFund(receiver) (/unique_chucks/31/0x0af02d90d359a4628ace226df184c3e8b4b816ff.sol#379-380)
	- EOSBetGameInterface(SLOTS).payDevelopersFund(receiver) (/unique_chucks/31/0x0af02d90d359a4628ace226df184c3e8b4b816ff.sol#380-383)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- DEVELOPERSFUND (/unique_chucks/31/0x0af02d90d359a4628ace226df184c3e8b4b816ff.sol#390)

EOSBetBankroll.transfer (/unique_chucks/31/0x0af02d90d359a4628ace226df184c3e8b4b816ff.sol#408-426) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- balances[msg.sender] >= _value && _value > 0 && contributionTime[msg.sender] + WAITTIMEUNTILWITHDRAWORTRANSFER <= block.timestamp && _to != address(this) (/unique_chucks/31/0x0af02d90d359a4628ace226df184c3e8b4b816ff.sol#413-426)

EOSBetBankroll.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/31/0x0af02d90d359a4628ace226df184c3e8b4b816ff.sol#429-458) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- allowed[_from][msg.sender] >= _value && balances[_from] >= _value && _value > 0 && contributionTime[_from] + WAITTIMEUNTILWITHDRAWORTRANSFER <= block.timestamp && _to != address(this) (/unique_chucks/31/0x0af02d90d359a4628ace226df184c3e8b4b816ff.sol#431-458)

elements.expression: allowed[_from][msg.sender] >= _value && balances[_from] >= _value && _value > 0 && contributionTime[_from] + WAITTIMEUNTILWITHDRAWORTRANSFER <= block.timestamp && _to != address(this)

analysis.description:
EOSBetBankroll.cashoutEOSBetStakeTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0x0af02d90d359a4628ace226df184c3e8b4b816ff.sol#275-325) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_amountTokens <= tokenBalance && contributionTime[msg.sender] + WAITTIMEUNTILWITHDRAWORTRANSFER <= block.timestamp && _amountTokens > 0) (/unique_chucks/31/0x0af02d90d359a4628ace226df184c3e8b4b816ff.sol#289-292)

EOSBetGameInterface.DEVELOPERSFUND should be constant (/unique_chucks/31/0x0af02d90d359a4628ace226df184c3e8b4b816ff.sol#54-55)
EOSBetGameInterface.LIABILITIES should be constant (/unique_chucks/31/0x0af02d90d359a4628ace226df184c3e8b4b816ff.sol#55)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/31/0x0af02d90d359a4628ace226df184c3e8b4b816ff.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/31/0x0af02d90d359a4628ace226df184c3e8b4b816ff.sol#4-6): it allows old versions
